channel.title: Kowainik Blog
channel.description: We are writing about what we find fascinating or exciting. Our blog's aim is to share our knowledge about functional programming, distribute best-practices based on our extensive experience and tell about various topics from beginner-friendly introductions to advanced type-level tricks.

item.title: Brave New Hacktoberfest — Learn4Haskell
item.description: Results of the Hacktoberfest 2020 in Kowainik

item.title: Policeman in da Bristol city
item.description: Bristol Haskell Hackathon 2020 project — Policeman — a tool for Haskell PVP version suggesting.

item.title: Insane in the Membrain
item.description: Membrain is the Haskell library for type-safe memory units. This blog post provides details of the implementation and mentions type-level tricks.
item.dc:creator: Kowainik

item.description: Haskell Style guide used in Kowainik

item.title: tomland: Bidirectional TOML serialization
item.description: Architecture of the bidirectional serialization library with usage of profunctors, GADTs and Monad transformers

item.title: State monad comes to help sequential pattern matching
item.description: Combining Monad transformers and applicative functors for better error messages report
